name: Tarnished's Furled Finger
caption:
A finger of corpse wax, furled like a hook.
It is a relic of those who came before, left to help those who would come after.
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Creates a summon sign for cooperative multiplayer. Arrive as a cooperator (Furled Finger) with the objective of defeating the area boss of the world to which you were summoned.
vanilla_caption:
Item for online play.
(Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.)

Creates a summon sign for cooperative multiplayer.
Arrive as a cooperator (Furled Finger) with the objective of defeating the area boss of the world to which you were summoned.

A finger of corpse wax, furled like a hook.
It is a relic of those who came before, left to help those who would come after.
vanilla_info: Creates a summon sign for cooperative multiplayer

name: Duelist's Furled Finger
caption:
A finger of corpse wax, furled like a hook.
The bronze adornments are the mark of a duelist.
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Creates a summon sign for competitive multiplayer. Arrive as an adversary (Duelist) with the objective of defeating the Host of Fingers of the world to which you were summoned.
vanilla_caption:
Item for online play.
(Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.)

Creates a summon sign for competitive multiplayer.
Arrive as an adversary (Duelist) with the objective of defeating the Host of Fingers of the world to which you were summoned.

A finger of corpse wax, furled like a hook.
The bronze adornments are the mark of a duelist.
vanilla_info: Creates a summon sign for competitive multiplayer

name: Bloody Finger
caption: Glistening blood has been siphoned into the nail of this finger. Its sickly pale skin feels nothing now, but the nail still aches with sweetest pain.
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Attempts an invasion of another player's world. If successful, you will arrive as an invader (Bloody Finger) with the objective of defeating the Host of Fingers of that world.
vanilla_caption:
Item for online play.
(Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.)

Attempts an invasion of another player's world.
If successful, you will arrive as an invader (Bloody Finger) with the objective of defeating the Host of Fingers of that world.

Glistening blood has been siphoned into the nail of this finger. Its sickly pale skin feels nothing now, but the nail still aches with sweetest pain.
vanilla_info: Attempts invasion of other player's world

name: Finger Severer
caption: This phantom blade severs the link formed by a Furled Finger, but the maidens scorn those who abuse its use.
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Use as a Host of Fingers to select a summoned player and send them back to their world. Use when you have been summoned to another player's world to return to your own world.
vanilla_caption:
Item for online play.
(Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.)

Use as a Host of Fingers to select a summoned player and send them back to their world.

Use when you have been summoned to another player's world to return to your own world.

This phantom blade severs the link formed by a Furled Finger, but the maidens scorn those who abuse its use.
vanilla_info: Sends another, or oneself, home

name: White Cipher Ring
caption: One of the lost mystic codes said to have been bestowed by the Two Fingers.
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Allows you to automatically request for a hunter from another world to come to your rescue when your world is invaded. (Summoning is not always possible.)
vanilla_caption:
Item for online play.
(Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.)

Allows you to automatically request for a hunter from another world to come to your rescue when your world is invaded. (Summoning is not always possible.)

One of the lost mystic codes said to have been bestowed by the Two Fingers.
vanilla_info: When invaded, requests the aid of a hunter

name: Blue Cipher Ring
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Puts the wearer in ready state to answer should someone in another world call for rescue. You will be summoned to their world as a hunter.

During hunter multiplayer, your objective will be to defeat the invader of the summoned world.
vanilla_caption:
Item for online play.
(Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.)

Puts the wearer in ready state to answer should someone in another world call for rescue. You will be summoned to their world as a hunter.

During hunter multiplayer, your objective will be to defeat the invader of the summoned world.
vanilla_info: Answers requests for summoning from hunters

name: Tarnished's Wizened Finger
caption: A finger of corpse wax, so emaciated the bone is visible. It is a relic of those who came before, left to help those who would come after.
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Use to write messages. Your messages will be conveyed to other worlds, allowing other players to read them.
vanilla_caption:
Item for online play.
(Can also be used from the Messages menu.)

Use to write messages. Your messages will be conveyed to other worlds, allowing other players to read them.

A finger of corpse wax, so emaciated the bone is visible.
It is a relic of those who came before, left to help those who would come after.
vanilla_info: Used to write messages to other worlds

name: Phantom Bloody Finger
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Attempts another invasion of the most recently invaded world. This may come in handy should separation from the Host of Fingers force a temporary retreat.
vanilla_caption:
Item for online play.
Obtained after invading another world.
Consumed upon use.

Attempts another invasion of the most recently invaded world.
This may come in handy should separation from the Host of Fingers force a temporary retreat.
vanilla_info: Attempts repeat invasion of last targeted world

name: Taunter's Tongue
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Lures in invaders. This allows your world to be invaded without any Furled Finger cooperators present, and it also shortens the interval between windows of opportunity for invasion.

Additionally, enables the arrival of a second invader to join when a cooperator is present. (With two invaders, the maximum number of cooperators becomes one.)
vanilla_caption:
Item for online play.
(Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.)

Lures in invaders. This allows your world to be invaded without any Furled Finger cooperators present, and it also shortens the interval between windows of opportunity for invasion.

Additionally, enables the arrival of a second invader to join when a cooperator is present. (With two invaders, the maximum number of cooperators becomes one.)
vanilla_info: Lures in invaders

name: Small Golden Effigy
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Send a cooperative summon sign to several summoning pools (activated pools only).

In cooperative multiplayer, your objective will be to defeat the area boss of the world to which you were summoned.
vanilla_caption:
Item for online play.
(Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.)

Send a cooperative summon sign to several summoning pools (activated pools only).

In cooperative multiplayer, your objective will be to defeat the area boss of the world to which you were summoned.
vanilla_info: Sends a co-op sign to summoning pools

name: Small Red Effigy
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Send a competitive summon sign to several summoning pools (activated pools only).

In competitive multiplayer, your objective will be to defeat the Host of Fingers of the world to which you were summoned.
vanilla_caption:
Item for online play.
(Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.)

Send a competitive summon sign to several summoning pools (activated pools only).

In competitive multiplayer, your objective will be to defeat the Host of Fingers of the world to which you were summoned.
vanilla_info: Sends a hostile sign to summoning pools

caption: This furled finger is blackened with blood congestion. It seems to have been chopped off rather unceremoniously.

vanilla_caption:
Item for online play.
(Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.)
Consumed upon use.

name: Spectral Steed Whistle
caption: A delicate goldwork ring. Can be used as a finger whistle.
info:
Sound the whistle to summon and ride Torrent, the spectral steed. Dismounts and expels steed when used while on horseback.

Upon his death, the spectral steed can be summoned again, but doing so drains the Flask of Crimson Tears.
vanilla_caption:
A delicate goldwork ring. Can be used as a finger whistle.

Sound the whistle to summon and ride Torrent, the spectral steed.
(Dismounts steed when used while on horseback.)

Upon his death, the spectral steed can be summoned again, but doing so drains the Flask of Crimson Tears.
vanilla_info: Summon and ride Torrent, the spectral steed

name: Phantom Great Rune
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Enemies inside the invaded world receive a blessing of blood, which boosts their <font color="#E0B985">attack power</font> when <font color="#C84343">blood loss</font> occurs nearby. Also, your HP recovers when blessed enemies defeat a player.
vanilla_caption:
Item for online play.
Obtained after using the Mohg's Great Rune and invading another world.
Consumed upon use.

Enemies inside the invaded world receive a blessing of blood, which boosts their attack power when blood loss occurs nearby. Also, your HP recovers when blessed enemies defeat a player.
vanilla_info: Give blessing of blood to enemies in invaded world

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Reveals cooperative and competitive multiplayer signs. Co-op summoning signs will be shown in gold, while hostile summoning signs will be shown in red.

Multiplayer begins when you summon a player from another world through their sign.

Craftable item.
vanilla_caption:
Item for online play.
(Can also be used from the Multiplayer menu.)
Craftable item.

Reveals cooperative and competitive multiplayer signs.
Co-op summoning signs will be shown in gold, while hostile summoning signs will be shown in red.

name: Rune Arc
caption:
A shard of the shattered Elden Ring.

The lower arc of the Elden Ring is held to be the basin in which its blessings pool. Perhaps this shard originates from that very arc.
info: Increases your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> by 10%. If you have equipped a Great Rune at a site of grace then it will also activate the benefits of that Great Rune. These benefits will last until your next death.
vanilla_caption:
A shard of the shattered Elden Ring.
Grants the blessing of an equipped Great Rune upon use.

Even if no Great Rune is equipped, it will slightly increase maximum HP upon use.

The lower arc of the Elden Ring is held to be the basin in which its blessings pool. Perhaps this shard originates from that very arc.
vanilla_info: Grants the blessing of an equipped Great Rune upon use

name: Godrick's Great Rune
caption:
A Great Rune of the shardbearer Godrick.

This Great Rune is known as the anchor ring, found in the center of the Elden Ring. The first demigods were The Elden Lord Godfrey and his offspring, the golden lineage.
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">vigor</font>, <font color="#E0B985">mind</font>, <font color="#E0B985">endurance</font>, <font color="#E0B985">strength</font>, <font color="#E0B985">dexterity</font>, <font color="#E0B985">intelligence</font>, <font color="#E0B985">faith</font>, and <font color="#E0B985">arcane</font> by 5.

Once equipped at a site of grace you will need to use a Rune Arc to activate the benefits of this rune, which will then last until your next death.
vanilla_caption:
A Great Rune of the shardbearer Godrick.
Its blessing raises all attributes.

This Great Rune is known as the anchor ring, found in the center of the Elden Ring.

The first demigods were The Elden Lord Godfrey and his offspring, the golden lineage.
vanilla_info: Raises all attributes

name: Radahn's Great Rune
caption:
A Great Rune of the shardbearer Radahn.

Radahn was amongst the children of Rennala and Radagon, who became demigod stepchildren after Radagon's union with Queen Marika. The Great Rune burns, to resist the encroachment of the scarlet rot.
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font>, <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font>, and <font color="#E0B985">maximum stamina</font> by 15%.

Once equipped at a site of grace you will need to use a Rune Arc to activate the benefits of this rune, which will then last until your next death.
vanilla_caption:
A Great Rune of the shardbearer Radahn.
Its blessing raises maximum HP, FP and Stamina.

Radahn was amongst the children of Rennala and Radagon, who became demigod stepchildren after Radagon's union with Queen Marika.

The Great Rune burns, to resist the encroachment of the scarlet rot.
vanilla_info: Raises maximum HP, FP and stamina

name: Morgott's Great Rune
caption:
A Great Rune of the shardbearer Morgott.

This Great Rune is the anchor ring that houses the base, and proves two things: That the Omen King was born of the golden lineage, and that he was indeed the Lord of Leyndell.
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> by 25%.

Once equipped at a site of grace you will need to use a Rune Arc to activate the benefits of this rune, which will then last until your next death.
vanilla_caption:
A Great Rune of the shardbearer Morgott.
Its blessing greatly raises maximum HP.

This Great Rune is the anchor ring that houses the base, and proves two things:

That the Omen King was born of the golden lineage, and that he was indeed the Lord of Leyndell.
vanilla_info: Greatly raises maximum HP

name: Rykard's Great Rune
caption:
A Great Rune of the shardbearer Rykard.

Rykard was amongst the children of Rennala and Radagon, who became demigod stepchildren after Radagon's union with Queen Marika. But Rykard fed himself to the blasphemous serpent, Great Rune and all.
info:
Restores 185 HP when an enemy dies.

Once equipped at a site of grace you will need to use a Rune Arc to activate the benefits of this rune, which will then last until your next death.
vanilla_caption:
A Great Rune of the shardbearer Rykard.
Its blessing restores HP upon defeating enemies.

Rykard was amongst the children of Rennala and Radagon, who became demigod stepchildren after Radagon's union with Queen Marika.

But Rykard fed himself to the blasphemous serpent, Great Rune and all.
vanilla_info: Restores HP upon defeating enemies

name: Mohg's Great Rune
caption:
A Great Rune of the shardbearer Mohg.

Mohg and Morgott are twin brothers, and their Great Runes are naturally similar. But Mohg's rune is soaked in accursed blood, from his devout love for the wretched mire that he was born into far below the earth.
info:
Grants a blessing of blood to summoned phantoms, which restores 10% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> when an enemy dies from a summoned phantom and will occasionally give a temporary damage buff to the summoned phantom.

Once equipped at a site of grace you will need to use a Rune Arc to activate the benefits of this rune, which will then last until your next death.
vanilla_caption:
A Great Rune of the shardbearer Mohg.
Its blessing grants a blessing of blood to summoned phantoms, and imparts a Phantom Great Rune upon successful invasion.

Mohg and Morgott are twin brothers, and their Great Runes are naturally similar.

But Mohg's rune is soaked in accursed blood, from his devout love for the wretched mire that he was born into far below the earth.
vanilla_info: Grants a blessing of blood to phantoms

name: Malenia's Great Rune
caption:
A Great Rune of the shardbearer Malenia.

Malenia is daughter to Queen Marika and Radagon, and her Great Rune should have been the most sacred of all.
info:
Reduces healing from Flask of Crimson Tears by 30% but attacks recover HP for 5 seconds after damage is taken. The amount healed from this method cannot exceed the amount of damage that was received from the last single attack.

Once equipped at a site of grace you will need to use a Rune Arc to activate the benefits of this rune, which will then last until your next death.
vanilla_caption:
A Great Rune of the shardbearer Malenia.
The blessing of this half-rotted rune reduces the healing power of Flask of Crimson Tears.

And yet, due to the infusion of Malenia's spirit of resistance, attacks made immediately after receiving damage will partially recover HP.

Malenia is daughter to Queen Marika and Radagon, and her Great Rune should have been the most sacred of all.
vanilla_info: Attacks recover HP after damage is taken

name: Flask of Wondrous Physick
caption:
A relic of the physick chemists, priests of the Erdtree. Harnesses the powers of crystal tears, which only form after the passage of many moons.

Basins are placed at the feet of Minor Erdtrees throughout the Lands Between in order to collect their crystallized tears.
info:
Various special effects are bestowed upon the drinker, dependent on the specific mixture of crystal tears.

Rest at a site of grace to replenish.
vanilla_caption:
A relic of the physick chemists, priests of the Erdtree.
Harnesses the powers of crystal tears, which only form after the passage of many moons.

Various special effects are bestowed upon the drinker, dependent on the specific mixture of crystal tears. Though currently empty, simply rest at a site of grace to replenish.

Basins are placed at the feet of Minor Erdtrees throughout the Lands Between in order to collect their crystallized tears.
vanilla_info: Bestows various special effects, but is empty now

name: Fire Pot
caption: A cocktail of incendiary materials is sealed inside.
info:
Throw at an enemy to inflict <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 230

Craftable item using a Cracked Pot.
vanilla_caption:
Craftable item prepared using a cracked pot.
A cocktail of incendiary materials is sealed inside.

Throw at enemies to inflict fire damage.
vanilla_info: Throw at enemies to inflict fire damage

name: Redmane Fire Pot
caption:
Engraved with the crest of red-maned lion.

Even today, the survivors of Radahn's battalion employ fire to stave off the scarlet rot.
info:
Throw at an enemy to inflict <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 326

Craftable item using a Ritual Pot.
vanilla_caption:
Craftable item prepared using a ritual pot.
Engraved with the crest of red-maned lion.

Throw at enemies to inflict heavy fire damage.

Even today, the survivors of Radahn's battalion employ fire to stave off the scarlet rot.
vanilla_info: Throw at enemies to inflict heavy fire damage

name: Giantsflame Fire Pot
caption: Enchanted by incantations of the Giants' Flame.
info:
Throw at an enemy to inflict <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 344

Craftable item using a Ritual Pot.
vanilla_caption:
Craftable item prepared using a ritual pot.
Enchanted by incantations of the Giants' Flame.

Consumes FP. Throw at enemies to inflict heavy fire damage.

Damage scales with faith.

Alleviates scarlet rot buildup and cures rot aliment.

Scarlet rot accumulates gradually, coming into effect once the threshold is reached. Scarlet rot ailment greatly lowers HP in steady increments for a period.
vanilla_info: Alleviates scarlet rot buildup and cures rot

name: Rejuvenating Boluses

info:
Alleviates all <font color="#A17945">death blight accumulation</font>.

vanilla_caption:
Black boluses made of cave moss.

Filled with cerulean tears, this flask restores FP with use. Though currently empty, simply rest at a site of grace to replenish.

info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">immunity</font> by 100 for 60 seconds.

name: Shield Grease
caption: Solidified grease made from a mixture of magically resonant materials.
info:
Coats left-hand armament. Increases <font color="#E0B985">guard boost</font> by 13%, and reduces <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> from blocked attacks by 20% for 60 seconds. The amount that <font color="#E0B985">guard boost</font> is increased by depends on the shield's base guard boost. Shields with a lower base value will get a bigger increase, while shields with a higher base value will get a smaller increase.

Craftable item.
vanilla_caption:
Solidified grease made from a mixture of magically resonant materials. Craftable item.

Coats left-hand armament, boosting guarding ability and all forms of damage negation.

Primarily used on shields.

name: Throwing Dagger
caption:
Short dagger for throwing. It has no handguard. The blade is polished, and its weight is expertly balanced.

This auxiliary weapon, used primarily to constrain an enemy's movements, can still be deadly in the right hands.
info:
Throw at an enemy to inflict <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font>.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 67

Short dagger for throwing. It has no handguard.

caption:

These shards of stone are believed to have once been part of a temple in the sky. They glow with a faint light from within.
info:
Material used for crafting items but can also be thrown.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 1

name: Rainbow Stone
caption:
Ruin Fragment that has undergone some simple processing. Stones such as these shine with the colors of the rainbow, making them useful markers when placed on the ground.

Once used to entertain children on the fringes of the Lands Between.
info:
Shines with colored light when placed, serving as a guide.

If the stone shatters when dropped from a high place then it is not a survivable fall.

Craftable item.
vanilla_caption:
Ruin Fragment that has undergone some simple processing.
Craftable item.

Stones such as these shine with the colors of the rainbow, making them useful markers when placed on the ground.

Can also be dropped to gauge the distance of a fall. The higher the pitch of the sound, the higher the likelihood of the fall being fatal.

Once used to entertain children on the fringes of the Lands Between.
vanilla_info: Shines with colored light when placed, serving as a guide

name: Glowstone
caption: Polished Ruin Fragment that shines brighter than Rainbow Stone.
info:
Emits a faint light to increase visibility in dark areas for 120 seconds from the location it is placed.

Craftable item.
vanilla_caption:
Polished Ruin Fragment that shines brighter than Rainbow Stone.
Craftable item.

Emits light from the location it is placed, illuminating surroundings.
However, the effect is short-lived, and it lacks the diverse colors of rainbow stones.

May serve some benefit in dark places, or at night.
vanilla_info: Emits a faint light from the location it is placed

name: Telescope
caption:
Astrology tool used by members of the Carian royal family. A stolen part of a larger instrument.

During the age of the Erdtree, Carian astrology withered on the vine. The fate once writ in the night skies had been fettered by the Golden Order.
info: Allows you to see faraway things.
vanilla_caption:
Astrology tool used by members of the Carian royal family.
A stolen part of a larger instrument.

Allows the viewer to better see faraway things.

During the age of the Erdtree, Carian astrology withered on the vine. The fate once writ in the night skies had been fettered by the Golden Order.
vanilla_info: Allows viewer to see faraway things

name: Grace Mimic
caption:
A fetish indicating the guidance of grace.

Useful as a last resort for those who have lost their way, or for use by those who believe that unrefined guidance will lead to truer encounters.
info:
Light shows the suggested path for 30 seconds, but without particular order.

Craftable item.
vanilla_caption:
A fetish indicating the guidance of grace.
Craftable item.

Similar to grace, this fetish draws rays guiding the way, only without any sense of order.

Useful as a last resort for those who have lost their way, or for use by those who believe that unrefined guidance will lead to truer encounters.
vanilla_info: Light shows the path, but without order

name: Lantern
caption:
A small waist-worn lantern that illuminates surroundings.

While its light is dimmer than that of a torch, it has the advantage of freeing up the user's hands.
info: Use to attach it to your waist. Increases visibility in dark areas while keeping both hands free.
vanilla_caption:
A small waist-worn lantern that illuminates surroundings.

Use once to turn on, and again to turn off.

While its light is dimmer than that of a torch,
it has the advantage of freeing up the user's hands.
vanilla_info: Attach to waist to illuminate surroundings

name: Deathroot
caption:
A source that gives rise to Those Who Live in Death.

On the night of the dire plot the stolen Rune of Death enabled the first Death of a demigod. Later, the Rune of Death spread across the Lands Between through the underground roots of the Greattree, sprouting in the form of Deathroot.
info: Give to the Beast Clergyman, found at Bestial Sanctum in the distant east, who collects and devours these roots.
vanilla_caption:
A source that gives rise to Those Who Live in Death.

The Beast Clergyman, found at Bestial Sanctum in the distant east, collects and devours these roots.

On the night of the dire plot the stolen Rune of Death enabled the first Death of a demigod. Later, the Rune of Death spread across the Lands Between through the underground roots of the Greattree, sprouting in the form of Deathroot.
vanilla_info: Beast Clergyman seeks and devours these

name: Soft Cotton
caption:
A soft but sturdy cotton formed from splitting open Rowa fruit in a particular manner.

If you must court danger, at the very least, tread lightly.
info:
Completely negates fall damage and sound made during movement for 20 seconds.

The height at which a fall is fatal remains the same even while under the effects of this item.

Craftable item.
vanilla_caption:
A soft but sturdy cotton formed from splitting open Rowa fruit in a particular manner.
Craftable item.

Attaching this cotton to the bottom of one's feet allows for a temporary reduction in fall damage and sound. It also reduces the sound of one's footsteps.

If you must court danger, at the very least, tread lightly.
vanilla_info: Temporarily reduces fall damage/sound and sound of footsteps

name: Soap
caption:
A plant-based soap made from mushroom juice.

Filth covering the exterior eventually seeps inside, soiling one's very spirit.
info:
Cleans blood and filth from the body and alleviates 100 <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font>.

Craftable item.
vanilla_caption:
A plant-based soap made from mushroom juice.
Craftable item.

Cleans off filth and other accumulations on the body while also slightly reducing poison buildup.

Filth covering the exterior eventually seeps inside, soiling one's very spirit.
vanilla_info: Removes filth and accumulations on the body

name: Celestial Dew
caption:
A hidden Tear found in the Eternal City. Also known as a Night Tear.

Once upon a time, the stars of the night sky guided fate, and this is a recollection of those times.
info:
Allows you to carry out an Absolution at the Church of Vows.

Absolution causes anyone who was previously friendly towards you to forgive your violent transgressions towards them, if they're still alive.
vanilla_caption:
A hidden Tear found in the Eternal City.
Also known as a Night Tear.

Allows one to carry out an Absolution at the Church of Vows, reversing all antagonizations.

Once upon a time, the stars of the night sky guided fate, and this is a recollection of those times.
vanilla_info: Carry out Absolution at the Church of Vows

name: Margit's Shackle
caption:
A fetish bathed in golden magic.

Shackles were used to bind the accursed people called the Omen, and these ones were made to keep a particular Omen under strictest confinement.

Though faint, the shackles still retain vestiges of powerenough to trap the once-bound Margit on earth.
info:
Binds Margit or Morgott in place for 5 seconds.

Can be used twice per fight, but must be used early.
vanilla_caption:
A fetish bathed in golden magic.

Use to subdue the flame of frenzy if inherited, allowing one to cheat fate and avoid becoming Lord of Frenzied Flame.

However, the needle is as yet unfinished and can only be used in the heart of the storm beyond time said to be found in Farum Azula.

A feeble man sought power through the grotesque act of grafting. "One day we'll return together, to our home, bathed in rays of gold."

caption:
Remembrance of the warrior Hoarah Loux, hewn into the Erdtree.

When Godfrey, first Elden Lord was robbed of his grace, becoming Tarnished, he took with him his kinfolk and left the Lands Between.

After the Long March of the Tarnished came to an end, Godfrey divested himself of kingship, becoming a simple warrior once more.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 55

name: Omen Bairn
caption:
Doll of a curseborn bairn.

Omen babies have all their horns excised, causing most to perish. These fetishes are made to memorialize them.
"Please, don't hate me, or curse me. Please."
info:
Produce an explosion of <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> which releases several wraiths that chase down foes.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (explosion):</font> 105
<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (wraith):</font> 70

caption:
Doll of a curseborn bairn from the Erdtree's royal line.

Omen babies born of royalty do not have their horns excised, but instead are kept underground, unbeknownst to anyone, imprisoned for eternity. These memorial fetishes are fashioned in secret.
info:
Produce an explosion of <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> which releases a large number of wraiths that chase down foes.

caption:
This statuette depicts a flower that preys on humans, posed in prayer.

Miranda, maiden of the Flower Crucible is said to have been the very first of this breed.
info:
Call down a large number of light strikes randomly in an area around the target for 7 seconds.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 95

info:
Throw at or near an enemy to produce 3 homing magic projectiles where it lands.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 92

Craftable item.
vanilla_caption:

name: Mimic's Veil
caption:
Golden veil of intricate design.

When Godrick was hounded from Leyndell, the Royal Capital, this was one of a multitude of treasures he took with him. Also known as "Marika's Mischief."
info: Transform yourself into an object from the area you are in. You can still move around while transformed, but performing any other action will revert the transformation. Non-aggressive enemies will ignore you as long as they don't see you moving.
vanilla_caption:
Golden veil of intricate design.

Uses FP to mimic nearby objects.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 160

caption:
Bell used by worshippers of revenants.

Ring bell to call a single prowling wraith. Can be used repeatedly to call multiple in quick succession.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 120

name: Holy Water Grease
caption:
Grease which holds the blessing of the Erdtree.

There is no place in the Golden Order for those who have exceeded life's bounds. These blemishes must be hunted down by the Virtuous.
info:
Coats right-hand armament. Adds 95 <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> for 60 seconds.

Craftable item.
vanilla_caption:
Grease which holds the blessing of the Erdtree.
Craftable item.

Consumes FP when coated on weapon, allowing
it to deal magical damage and purify those who
have lived beyond death.

name: Warming Stone
caption:
Ruin Fragment blessed with an incantation of the Two Fingers.

It's said that the Erdtree was once as warm as the gentle sun, and would gradually heal all who bathed in its rays.
info:
Drop at your feet to restore 25 HP per second for anyone, including enemies, in a small area of effect for 30 seconds.

Craftable item.
vanilla_caption:
Ruin Fragment blessed with an incantation of the Two Fingers. Craftable item.

Uses FP to generate warmth, continuously restoring the HP of those nearby.

It's said that the Erdtree was once as warm as the gentle sun, and would gradually heal all who bathed in its rays.

caption:
Ruin Fragment blessed with an incantation of the Three Fingers.

Confers madness upon those who have not adopted the flame. Take care not to mistake this for its gentler cousin.
info:
Drop at your feet to restore 35 HP per second for anyone, including enemies, in a small area of effect for 30 seconds.

Only work on those who host the frenzied flame.

Craftable item.

Ruin Fragment blessed with an incantation of the Three Fingers. Craftable item.

name: Scriptstone
caption:
Ruin Fragment with a cipher inscription.

Words are gregarious things, drawn to one another much as people are.
info:
Online multiplayer item.

Reveals more messages from other worlds.

Craftable item.
vanilla_caption:
Ruin Fragment with a cipher inscription.
Craftable item.

Uses FP to reveal more messages from other worlds.

Words are gregarious things, drawn to one another much as people are.

name: Bewitching Branch
caption:
Tree branch blessed with an incantation of unalloyed gold.

The Empyrean Miquella is loved by many people. Indeed, he has learned very well how to compel such affection.
info:
Spray a pink smoke directly in front of you that will charm enemies inside of it, which will cause them to be your ally for 180 seconds.

Craftable item.
vanilla_caption:
Tree branch blessed with an incantation of unalloyed gold.
Craftable item.

Pierce a foe, using FP to turn them into a temporary ally.

The Empyrean Miquella is loved by many people. Indeed, he has learned very well how to compel such affection.
vanilla_info: Uses FP to charm pierced enemy

name: Baldachin's Blessing
caption:
Favor bestowed by a deathbed companion. Protection of a hidden temple in the guise of a bedchamber.

The favor allows one to forget any aches and pains. In Death, there is only peace, for in Death, there can be no sensation.
info:
Possessing this item reduces your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> by 5%. Using this item reduces <font color="#F395C4">physical damage received</font> by 35% and reduces <font color="#E0B985">poise damage received</font> by about 34.2% for 15 seconds.

Although this item shows your poise stat increase by about 52%, this item doesn't actually increase your maximum poise. It only reduces the amount of poise damage that you receive from each attack.

This effect can be combined with the effects of Bull-Goat's Talisman to reduce <font color="#E0B985">poise damage received</font> by about 50.65%.
vanilla_caption:
Favor bestowed by a deathbed companion. Protection of a hidden temple in the guise of a bedchamber.

Uses FP to temporarily boost poise.

The favor allows one to forget any aches and pains. In Death, there is only peace, for in Death, there can be no sensation.
vanilla_info: Uses FP to temporarily boost poise

name: Radiant Baldachin's Blessing
caption:
Protection of a hidden temple in the guise of a bedchamber. This blessing is of the utmost rarity.

It is said a deathbed companion will only produce a blessing of this kind for a champion but once in her entire life. The sole blessing which she imbues of her own volition.
info:
Using this item reduces <font color="#F395C4">physical damage received</font> by 35% and reduces <font color="#E0B985">poise damage received</font> by about 45% for 70 seconds.

Although this item shows your poise stat increase by about 82%, this item doesn't actually increase your maximum poise. It only reduces the amount of poise damage that you receive from each attack.

This effect can be combined with the effects of Bull-Goat's Talisman to reduce <font color="#E0B985">poise damage received</font> by about 58.75%.
vanilla_caption:
Protection of a hidden temple in the guise of a bedchamber. This blessing is of the utmost rarity.

Uses FP to temporarily raise poise.
The effect lasts longer than a mere favor.

It is said a deathbed companion will only produce a blessing of this kind for a champion but once in her entire life. The sole blessing which she imbues of her own volition.
vanilla_info: Uses FP to temporarily boost poise

name: Uplifting Aromatic
caption:
Art of the perfumers who fought in the Shattering.

This aromatic has an extremely potent morale-raising effect that makes those accustomed to it fearless in the face of death. It was this influence that made the perfumers exceptional commanders.
info:
Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 90% for the next single attack received wihtin 40 seconds and increases <font color="#F395C4">physical damage inflicted</font> by 10% for 40 seconds. These buffs are applied to the player and all nearby allies.

Craftable item using a Perfume Bottle.
vanilla_caption:
Art of the perfumers who fought in the Shattering.
Craftable with a perfume bottle.

Uses FP to raise the attack power of the user and nearby allies while also reducing the damage from one incoming attack by half.

This aromatic has an extremely potent morale-raising effect that makes those accustomed to it fearless in the face of death. It was this influence that made the perfumers exceptional commanders.
vanilla_info: Boosts ally attack power and reduces incoming damage once

name: Spark Aromatic
caption:
Art of the perfumers who fought in the Shattering.

Though fire was prohibited to those who served the Erdtree, this rule was forgotten as the war drew ever on.
info:
Scatter sparks in a wide arc straight ahead, which will ignite to inflict <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 352

Craftable item using a Perfume Bottle.
vanilla_caption:
Art of the perfumers who fought in the Shattering.
Craftable with a perfume bottle.

Uses FP to broadly scatter sparks in a wide arc straight ahead.

Though fire was prohibited to those who served the Erdtree, this rule was forgotten as the war drew ever on.
vanilla_info: Uses FP to scatter sparks in a wide area

name: Ironjar Aromatic
caption:
Forbidden art of depraved perfumers.

An art that requires fragments of hunted noble jars. Depraved perfumers are plainly in league with jar poachers.
info:
Drink to turn your body and armor to steel for 40 seconds, which reduces <font color="#F395C4">physical damage received</font> by 40%, increases <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage received</font> by 60%, increases <font color="#E0B985">all resistances</font> by 45, and causes you to be very heavy and slow.

While under the effects of this lighter physical attacks from enemies may cause the enemy to briefly stagger backwards after hitting you.

Craftable item using a Perfume Bottle.
vanilla_caption:
Forbidden art of depraved perfumers.
Craftable with a perfume bottle.

Uses FP to temporarily turn body to steel, boosting poise, resistances and damage negation at the expense of mobility and lightning resistance.

An art that requires fragments of hunted noble jars. Depraved perfumers are plainly in league with jar poachers.
vanilla_info: Uses FP to temporarily turn wielder's body to steel

name: Bloodboil Aromatic
caption:
Forbidden art of depraved perfumers.

"Even upon the battlefield, do you fear being wounded? Take a good look. Your limbs are frozen stiff."
info:
Drink to enter a temporary state of fervor for 60 seconds, which increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum stamina</font> by 20% and <font color="#F395C4">physical damage inflicted</font> by 30%, but increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 25%.

Craftable item using a Perfume Bottle.
vanilla_caption:
Forbidden art of depraved perfumers.
Craftable with a perfume bottle.

Uses FP to enter a temporary state of fervor, raising maximum attack power and stamina while also increasing damage received.

"Even upon the battlefield, do you fear being wounded? Take a good look. Your limbs are frozen stiff."
vanilla_info: Uses FP to enter a temporary state of fervor

name: Poison Spraymist
caption:
Forbidden art of depraved perfumers.

Perfumed powder is held in the mouth to dissolve before being expelled. It was once a restorative art, or so it is said.
info:
Spray a poison mist from your mouth and leave a lingering cloud of poison in the area for 7 seconds, which will cause 26 <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font> 5 times per second to enemies within the area of effect.

<font color="#40BF40">Poison:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.21% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 21, every second for 30 seconds.

Craftable item using a Perfume Bottle.
vanilla_caption:
Forbidden art of depraved perfumers.
Craftable with a perfume bottle.

Uses FP to release a poison mist from user's mouth, causing a buildup of poison.

Perfumed powder is held in the mouth to dissolve before being expelled. It was once a restorative art, or so it is said.
vanilla_info: Uses FP to release poison mist from the mouth

name: Acid Spraymist
caption:
Forbidden art of depraved perfumers.

Perfumed powder is held in the mouth to dissolve before being expelled. It was once a restorative art, or so it is said.
info:
Spray acid mist from your mouth and leave a lingering cloud of acid in the area for 7 seconds, which will instantly inflict the <font color="#C18B8B">acid debuff</font> on any enemy within the area of effect.

<font color="#C18B8B">Acid debuff:</font> Reduces <font color="#F395C4">physical damage inflicted</font> by 15% for 60 seconds.

Craftable item using a Perfume Bottle.
vanilla_caption:
Forbidden art of depraved perfumers.
Craftable with a perfume bottle.

Uses FP to release an acidic mist from user's mouth, damaging armaments and temporarily lowering attack power.

Perfumed powder is held in the mouth to dissolve before being expelled. It was once a restorative art, or so it is said.
vanilla_info: Uses FP to release acid mist from the mouth

name: Glintstone Pebble
caption:
The most basic glintstone sorcery of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

This is a universal first step on the journey to true knowledge of sorcery.
info:
Shoot a single magic glintstone projectile. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 152
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
The most basic glintstone sorcery of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

The glintstone serves as a conduit, launching magical projectiles at foes.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion.

This is a universal first step on the journey to true knowledge of sorcery.
vanilla_info: Fires magic projectiles from glintstone

name: Great Glintstone Shard
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Those unworthy of the stone crown typically end their brief journey into sorcery here.
info:
Shoot a single magic glintstone projectile. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 202
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

The glintstone serves as a conduit, launching large magical projectiles at foes.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion.

Those unworthy of the stone crown typically end their brief journey into sorcery here.
vanilla_info: Fires larger magic projectiles from glintstone

name: Swift Glintstone Shard
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Those unworthy of the stone crown typically end their brief journey into sorcery here.
info:
Quickly shoot a single magic glintstone projectile. Can be cast without delay after performing another action and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 114
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

The glintstone serves as a conduit, launching swift magical projectiles at foes.
This sorcery can be used without delay after performing another action.

Those unworthy of the stone crown typically end their brief journey into sorcery here.
vanilla_info: Swiftly fires magic projectiles from glintstone

name: Glintstone Cometshard
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

A sorcery of the Karolos Conspectus, the most venerable of the academy.
info:
Shoot a magical comet with a trailing tail. Charging increases damage. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 259
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 324
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Fires a magical comet with a trailing tail.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. Charging enhances potency.

A sorcery of the Karolos Conspectus, the most venerable of the academy.
vanilla_info: Fires a magic comet with a trailing tail

name: Comet
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

The greatest of the Karolos Conspectus's sorceries, that only a very few sorcerers have ever mastered.
info:
Shoot a great magical comet. Charging increases damage. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 292
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 365
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Fires a great magical comet.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. Charging enhances potency.

The greatest of the Karolos Conspectus's sorceries, that only a very few sorcerers have ever mastered.
vanilla_info: Fires a great magic comet

name: Shard Spiral
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

A sorcery of the Karolos Conspectus, the most venerable of the academy. This was the product of a failed attempt to create a new comet.
info:
Shoot twin projectiles that form a spiral as they travel. Charging increases damage. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 92
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 110
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Fires twin projectiles that form a spiral as they travel. This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion.
Charging enhances potency.

A sorcery of the Karolos Conspectus, the most venerable of the academy. This was the product of a failed attempt to create a new comet.
vanilla_info: Fires twin spiraling projectiles

name: Glintstone Stars
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

A sorcery of the Olivinus Conspectus, which attracts sorcerers from Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
info:
Shoot 3 magic shooting stars of varying power which pursue the target. Charging increases damage. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 68, 78, 87
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 80, 90, 99
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Fires three magic shooting stars that pursue the target.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging enhances potency.

A sorcery of the Olivinus Conspectus, which attracts sorcerers from Sellia, Town of Sorcery.
vanilla_info: Fires three shooting stars that pursue foes

name: Star Shower
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.



The most difficult to master of the Olivinus Conspectus sorceries.
info:
Shoot 6 magic shooting stars of varying power which pursue the target. Charging increases damage. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 44, 49, 59, 69, 69, 79
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 53, 58, 63, 68, 78, 88
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Fires six magic shooting stars that pursue the target.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging enhances potency.

The most difficult to master of the Olivinus Conspectus sorceries.
vanilla_info: Fires six shooting stars that pursue foes

name: Crystal Barrage
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

A sorcery of the Crystal Cadre, a group of sorcerers who pursue the wisdom of stonethe secrets locked in the faint cogitation of the Crystalians.
info:
Shoot a volley of glintstone crystal shards. Charging vastly increases quantity of projectiles. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 36
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Fires a volley of glintstone crystal shards.
Charging increases potency.

A sorcery of the Crystal Cadre, a group of sorcerers who pursue the wisdom of stonethe secrets locked in the faint cogitation of the Crystalians.
vanilla_info: Fires a volley of glintstone crystal shards

name: Glintstone Arc
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Granted to sorcerers who depart from the academy to embark on journeys, in order to fend off large groups of would-be adversaries. Fools often roam in packs.
info:
Shoot a horizontal arc of magic which spreads outward and can pass through multiple enemies. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 148
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Fires a horizontal arc of magic that spreads outward.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion.

Granted to sorcerers who depart from the academy to embark on journeys, in order to fend off large groups of would-be adversaries. Fools often roam in packs.
vanilla_info: Fires a horizontally-widening magic arc

name: Cannon of Haima
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Drawn from the conspectus of Haima, the adjudicator of the academy, this sorcery employs might as a means to quell conflict.
info:
Lob a magic projectile which flies in an arc and explodes on impact. Charging increases damage and size of the explosion. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 285
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 332
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Lobs an explosive magic projectile that flies in an arc.
Charging enhances potency.

Drawn from the conspectus of Haima, the adjudicator of the academy, this sorcery employs might as a means to quell conflict.
vanilla_info: Lobs an explosive magic projectile in an arc

name: Crystal Burst
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

A sorcery of the Crystal Cadre, a group of sorcerers who pursued the wisdom of stonethe secrets locked in the faint cogitation of the Crystalians.
info:
Shoot a burst of glintstone crystal shards. Charging increases damage and speed of projectiles. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 40
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 45
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Fires a burst of glintstone crystal shards.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. Charging increases potency.

A sorcery of the Crystal Cadre, a group of sorcerers who pursued the wisdom of stonethe secrets locked in the faint cogitation of the Crystalians.
vanilla_info: Fires a burst of glintstone crystal shards

name: Shatter Earth
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

A Stonedigger sorcery used by the glintstone miners of the crystal tunnel. At the academy, use of this sorcery was a stigma that marked out failed scholars.
info:
Imbue the staff with magic, then thrust it into the ground to create a magical shockwave. Allows one follow-up cast, which will be another quick thrust into the ground to create a larger, more powerful shockwave.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (thrust):</font> 52
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (shockwave):</font> 182
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (second thrust):</font> 68
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (second shockwave):</font> 205
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone, Stonedigger
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Imbues the ferrule of the caster's staff with magic, then thrusts it into the ground to create a magical shockwave.
Allows one follow-up attack.

A Stonedigger sorcery used by the glintstone miners of the crystal tunnel. At the academy, use of this sorcery was a stigma that marked out failed scholars.
vanilla_info: Thrust staff into ground to emit a shockwave

name: Rock Blaster
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

An enhanced version of the glintstone miners' Stonedigger sorcery.
info:
Imbue the staff with magic. Hold to create a magical drill which you can walk into enemies to inflict continuous magical damage. Release to thrust it into the ground and create a large magical shockwave.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (drill):</font> 64
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (shockwave):</font> 212
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone, Stonedigger
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Imbues the ferrule of the caster's staff with magic, then thrusts it into the ground to create a massive magical shockwave.

Hold to continue moving without striking the ground, and then push the end of the staff into enemies.

An enhanced version of the glintstone miners' Stonedigger sorcery.
vanilla_info: Thrust staff into ground to emit a massive shockwave

name: Gavel of Haima
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Drawn from the scholarly conspectus of Haima, the adjudicator of the academy, this sorcery employs might as a means to quell conflict.
info:
Conjure a magical greathammer and slam it down, creating a massive shockwave. Allows one follow-up cast, which will be the same as the first.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (hammer):</font> 297
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (shockwave):</font> 242
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Creates a magical greathammer and slams it down.
Allows one follow-up attack.

Drawn from the scholarly conspectus of Haima, the adjudicator of the academy, this sorcery employs might as a means to quell conflict.
vanilla_info: Attacks using a magic greathammer

name: Terra Magica
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Once, the sigil would be cast from the highest belfry of the academy, covering the entire institution's grounds. This spell allows such vivid experience of spell-casting success, it turns many a fledgling into a true sorcerer in a flash of newfound understanding.
info:
Draw an academy sigil upon the ground for 30 seconds, increasing the <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage inflicted</font> by you and allies standing within it by 35%. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Draws an academy sigil upon the ground, raising the magic strength of those within.

Once, the sigil would be cast from the highest belfry of the academy, covering the entire institution's grounds. This spell allows such vivid experience of spell-casting success, it turns many a fledgling into a true sorcerer in a flash of newfound understanding.
vanilla_info: Raises the magic strength of those within the sigil

name: Starlight
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Granted to sorcerers who depart from the academy to embark on journeys. Even during the blackest nights, sojourns underground, or imprisonment in gaol, the stars are never far from a sorcerer's side.
info:
Conjure a small, floating star of light which follows you and increases visibility in dark areas for 180 seconds. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Creates a small, floating star light that illuminates surroundings.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion.

Granted to sorcerers who depart from the academy to embark on journeys. Even during the blackest nights, sojourns underground, or imprisonment in gaol, the stars are never far from a sorcerer's side.
vanilla_info: Creates star light to illuminate surroundings

name: Comet Azur
caption:
Legendary sorcery devised by Azur, primeval sorcerer.

A tremendous comet in a torrent akin to the distant starry expanse, the place said to be the origin of glintstone.

When Azur glimpsed into the primeval current, he saw darkness. He was left both bewitched and fearful of the abyss.
info:
Shoot a large beam that inflicts continuous, fluctuating damage. Hold to continue casting. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 55-100
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Primeval Current
vanilla_caption:
Legendary sorcery devised by Azur, primeval sorcerer.

Fires a tremendous comet in a torrent akin to the distant starry expanse, the place said to be the origin of glintstone.
Hold to continue releasing the sorcery's power.

When Azur glimpsed into the primeval current, he saw darkness. He was left both bewitched and fearful of the abyss.
vanilla_info: Fires a tremendous comet within a starry torrent

name: Founding Rain of Stars
caption:
The eldest primeval sorcery, said to have been discovered by an ancient astrologer. A sorcery of legendary status.

Thought to be the founding glintstone sorcery. The glimpse of the primeval current that the astrologer saw became real, and the stars' amber rained down on this land.
info:
Conjure cosmic clouds above you which rapidly rain down a barrage of magical projectiles in the area for 5 seconds. Charging increases damage. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 49
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 54
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Primeval Current
vanilla_caption:
The eldest primeval sorcery, said to have been discovered by an ancient astrologer. A sorcery of legendary status.

Summons a dark cloud of stars overhead. Shortly after, the cloud will release a violent deluge of star rain. This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging increases potency.

Thought to be the founding glintstone sorcery. The glimpse of the primeval current that the astrologer saw became real, and the stars' amber rained down on this land.
vanilla_info: Releases a downpour of star rain for a while

name: Stars of Ruin
caption:
Legendary sorcery devised by Lusat, primeval sorcerer.

When Lusat glimpsed into the primeval current, he beheld the final moments of a great star cluster, and upon seeing it, he too was broken.
info:
Shoot 12 dark stars which pursue the target and inflict varying amounts of damage. Charging increases damage. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 43, 45, 49, or 52
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 54, 57, 60, or 65
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Primeval Current
vanilla_caption:
Legendary sorcery devised by Lusat, primeval sorcerer.

Fires twelve dark shooting stars that pursue the target.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging increases potency.

When Lusat glimpsed into the primeval current, he beheld the final moments of a great star cluster, and upon seeing it, he too was broken.
vanilla_info: Fires twelve dark shooting stars that pursue foes

name: Glintblade Phalanx
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Bestowed upon the enchanted Carian knights, who combined this art with their swordsmanship to maintain pressure upon their foes, striking in waves of steel and sorcery.
info:
Conjure 5 magical dagger projectiles which float above you and automatically shoot into an enemy when they are within range. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 60
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Glintblade
vanilla_caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Creates a defensive arch of magic glintblades overhead, which automatically attack nearby foes.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion.

Bestowed upon the enchanted Carian knights, who combined this art with their swordsmanship to maintain pressure upon their foes, striking in waves of steel and sorcery.
vanilla_info: Forms a defensive arch of magic glintblades

name: Carian Phalanx
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

An enhanced version of the glintblade sorcery used by enchanted knights.
info:
Conjure 9 magical dagger projectiles which float above you and automatically shoot into an enemy when they are within range. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 48
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Glintblade
vanilla_caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Creates a defensive arch of numerous magic glintblades overhead, which automatically attack nearby foes.
This sorcery can be used cast while in motion.

An enhanced version of the glintblade sorcery used by enchanted knights.
vanilla_info: Forms a defensive arch of numerous magic glintblades

name: Greatblade Phalanx
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Used by the enchanted troll knights. They were the comrades of the young Rennala, bound by oath.
info:
Conjure 3 magical sword projectiles which float above you and automatically shoot into an enemy when they are within range. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 100
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Glintblade
vanilla_caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Creates a defensive arch of larger magic glintblades overhead, which automatically attack nearby foes.

Used by the enchanted troll knights.
They were the comrades of the young Rennala, bound by oath.
vanilla_info: Forms a defensive arch of larger magic glintblades

name: Rennala's Full Moon
caption:
Sorcery symbolic of the Carian queen.

Queen Rennala encountered this enchanting moon when she was young, and later, it would bewitch the academy.
info:
Incarnate a moon, then send it floating forward to explode after 3.5 seconds or on impact. Reduces <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage negation</font> of any target hit by the spell by 20% for 60 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 360
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Moon
vanilla_caption:
Sorcery symbolic of the Carian queen.

Uses the caster as a vessel to incarnate a full moon, then sends it floating toward foes. The full moon dispels all sorcery that touches it, and temporarily reduces magic damage negation for those it strikes.

Queen Rennala encountered this enchanting moon when she was young, and later, it would bewitch the academy.
vanilla_info: Incarnate a full moon and launch it at foes

name: Ranni's Dark Moon
caption:
Legendary sorcery symbolic of the Carian queen.

This moon was encountered by a young Ranni, led by the hand of her mother, Rennala. What she beheld was cold, dark, and veiled in occult mystery.
info:
Incarnate a cold moon, then send it floating forward to explode after 3.5 seconds or on impact. Causes <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> and reduces <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage negation</font> of any target hit by the spell by 20% for 60 seconds.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 330
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation:</font> 270
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Moon
vanilla_caption:
Legendary sorcery symbolic of the Carian queen.

Uses the caster as a vessel to incarnate a cold, dark moon, then sends it floating toward foes. The dark moon dispels all sorcery that touches it, and temporarily reduces magic damage negation for those it strikes.

This moon was encountered by a young Ranni, led by the hand of her mother, Rennala. What she beheld was cold, dark, and veiled in occult mystery.
vanilla_info: Incarnate a cold, dark moon and launch it at foes

name: Magic Downpour
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Said to have been taught by the Crystalians to mark the swearing of the old concord.
info:
Conjure a mass of magic which shoots 5 sets of 5 small magic projectiles. Charging increases it to 9 sets of 5 small magic projectiles. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 58
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian
vanilla_caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Summons a mass of magic that fires projectiles over a wide area.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging extends duration.

Said to have been taught by the Crystalians to mark the swearing of the old concord.
vanilla_info: Summon a magic mass that sprays projectiles over area

name: Loretta's Greatbow
caption:
Sorcery used by Royal Knight Loretta.

It is said that the bow was Loretta's favored weapon.
info:
Conjure a magic greatbow and use it to shoot a magic great arrow which explodes on impact. Hold to keep the magic great arrow nocked. Charging increases damage and size of explosion. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 270
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 330
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Loretta
vanilla_caption:
Sorcery used by Royal Knight Loretta.

Creates a magic greatbow and fires a great arrow.
Charging enhances potency. Hold to keep the great arrow nocked.

It is said that the bow was Loretta's favored weapon.
vanilla_info: Fires great arrow from a magic greatbow

name: Loretta's Mastery
caption:
Sorcery used by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree.

Developed by Loretta after her long, bloody journey to seek out a place where the Albinaurics could live in peace.
info:
Conjure a magic greatbow and use it to shoot 4 magic great arrows simultaneously which explode on impact. Hold to keep the magic great arrows nocked. Charging increases damage and size of explosion. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 108
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 127
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Loretta
vanilla_caption:
Sorcery used by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree.

Creates a magic greatbow and fires four great arrows simultaneously.
Charging enhances potency. Hold to keep the great arrows nocked.

Developed by Loretta after her long, bloody journey to seek out a place where the Albinaurics could live in peace.
vanilla_info: Fires four great arrows from magic greatbow at once

name: Magic Glintblade
caption:
An old sorcery of the Carian royal family.

Said to be the prototype of the sword-phalanx sorceries wielded by royal enchanted knights.
info:
Conjure a sigil overhead, from which a magical dagger projectile appears after a 3 second delay, which then shoots itself at an enemy. Charging increases the delay to 5 seconds and increases the damage. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 182
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 230
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Glintblade
vanilla_caption:
An old sorcery of the Carian royal family.

Creates a sigil overhead, from which an enemy-seeking glintblade appears after a brief delay.
This sorcery can be used while in motion. Charging increases the delay.

Said to be the prototype of the sword-phalanx sorceries wielded by royal enchanted knights.
vanilla_info: Creates sigil that forms a projectile glintblade after delay

name: Glintstone Icecrag
caption:
Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.

The snowy crone taught the young Ranni to fear the dark moon as she imparted her cold sorcery.
info:
Shoot a mass of cold magic. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 199
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation:</font> 100
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Cold
vanilla_caption:
Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.

The glintstone serves as a conduit, launching a mass of cold magic.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion.

The snowy crone taught the young Ranni to fear the dark moon as she imparted her cold sorcery.
vanilla_info: Fires mass of cold magic from glintstone

name: Zamor Ice Storm
caption:
Ice sorcery of the Town of Zamor.

Cloaked in icy tempests, the knights of Zamor have challenged the Fire Giants since ancient times.
info:
Conjure a large swirl of cold air which will hit enemies 6 times in 2 seconds. Charging increases this to 9 times in 3 seconds, increases the size of the swirl, and increases the magic damage.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 74
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 79
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation:</font> 80
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Cold
vanilla_caption:
Ice sorcery of the Town of Zamor.

Strike the ground with the staff to create a freezing tornado.
Charging enhances potency.

Cloaked in icy tempests, the knights of Zamor have challenged the Fire Giants since ancient times.
vanilla_info: Thrust staff into ground to create freezing tornado

name: Freezing Mist
caption:
Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.

The snowy crone taught the young Ranni to fear the dark moon as she imparted her cold sorcery.
info:
Conjure a cloud of cold air which lasts for 15 seconds and causes <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> 5 times per second. Charging increases size of cloud. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation:</font> 20
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Cold
vanilla_caption:
Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.

Releases a cold mist before the caster.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging enhances range of the mist.

The snowy crone taught the young Ranni to fear the dark moon as she imparted her cold sorcery.
vanilla_info: Releases cold mist before caster

name: Carian Greatsword
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Armed with this spell, sorcerers gain the strength of knights, their loyalty sworn to the moon.
info:
Conjure a large, magical greatsword and swing it horizontally. Can be cast repeatedly and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 268
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Carian Sword
vanilla_caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Conjures a magic greatsword and then delivers a sweeping blow.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly.

Armed with this spell, sorcerers gain the strength of knights, their loyalty sworn to the moon.
vanilla_info: Performs sweeping slash using magical greatsword

name: Adula's Moonblade
caption:
Sorcery of Adula, the Glintstone Dragon.

Adula, a devourer of sorcerers, was bested by Ranni and subsequently swore a knightly oath to her Dark Moon.
info:
Conjure a large, magical, icy greatsword and swing it horizontally, which launches a large horizontal arc of icy magic. Can be cast repeatedly and on horseback.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (greatsword):</font> 243
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (projectile):</font> 235
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (greatsword):</font> 120
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (projectile):</font> 35
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Cold, Carian Sword
vanilla_caption:
Sorcery of Adula, the Glintstone Dragon.

Conjures a cold magic greatsword, then delivers a sweeping blow that launches a blade-like projectile of frost.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly.

Adula, a devourer of sorcerers, was bested by Ranni and subsequently swore a knightly oath to her Dark Moon.
vanilla_info: Sweeping slash followed by cold blade projectile

name: Carian Slicer
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Even among the Carian sword sorceries, this is a notably effective technique.
info:
Conjure a small, magical blade and swing it horizontally. Can be cast repeatedly and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 180
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Carian Sword
vanilla_caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Conjures a magic sword and delivers a swift sweeping slash.
This sorcery can be used without delay after performing another action.

Even among the Carian sword sorceries, this is a notably effective technique.
vanilla_info: Performs swift sweeping slash using magical sword

name: Carian Piercer
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

This sorcery forms a counterpart to Carian Greatsword. Highly lethal when used against single foes riding alone.
info:
Conjure a large, magical ice greatsword and thrust it forward. Charging increases damage and extends the reach of the thrust. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 287
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 355
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Carian Sword
vanilla_caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Conjures a magic greatsword to impale foes.
Charging lengthens the initial step in.

This sorcery forms a counterpart to Carian Greatsword.
Highly lethal when used against single foes riding alone.
vanilla_info: Impales foes with magical greatsword

name: Scholar's Armament
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Taught to the Knights of the Cuckoo by the academy as payment for their contract.
info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Adds 75% of casting armament's sorcery scaling value as <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> for 90 seconds. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Enchants armament held in the right hand with magic-affinity attacks.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion.

Taught to the Knights of the Cuckoo by the academy as payment for their contract.
vanilla_info: Enchants right-hand armament with magic damage

name: Scholar's Shield
caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Taught to the Knights of the Cuckoo by the academy as payment for their contract.
info:
Enchant left-hand armament. Increases <font color="#E0B985">guard boost</font> by 20%, reduces <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage received</font> from blocked attacks by 70%, and reduces <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> from blocked attacks of any other type by 30% for 60 seconds. The amount that <font color="#E0B985">guard boost</font> is increased by depends on the shield's base guard boost. Shields with a lower base value will get a bigger increase, while shields with a higher base value will get a smaller increase. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
One of the glintstone sorceries of the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Enchants shield held in the left hand with additional damage negation.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion.

Taught to the Knights of the Cuckoo by the academy as payment for their contract.
vanilla_info: Enhances left-hand shield damage negation

name: Lucidity
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

The Carian knights never waver.
info:
Alleviate all <font color="#A698F4">sleep accumulation</font> and <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font>. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian
vanilla_caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Alleviates buildup of sleep and madness.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion.

The Carian knights never waver.

caption:
Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.

The snowy crone taught the young Ranni to fear the dark moon as she imparted her cold sorcery.
info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Causes 63 <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> per attack for 60 seconds. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Cold

Sorcery said to have been used by the old snow witch.
