name: Shattering Crystal
caption:
Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.

The Crystalians are inorganic beings, yet they live. They cleave close to the ideals of the primeval current, and as such, they are revered guests of the sorcerers.
info:
Shoot a barrage of crystal shards in a cone-shaped pattern, which inflict varying amounts of damage. Charging increases damage and speed of projectiles. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 51, 60, or 127
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 67, 75, or 160
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Crystalian
vanilla_caption:
Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.

Creates a mass of crystal, then shatters it in a forward burst.
Charging enhances potency.

The Crystalians are inorganic beings, yet they live. They cleave close to the ideals of the primeval current, and as such, they are revered guests of the sorcerers.
vanilla_info: Creates crystal mass that shatters in forward burst

name: Crystal Release
caption:
Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.

This sorcery is used by high-ranking adepts among the Crystalians. Some also call this sorcery "the Crystal Sun."
info:
Conjure a mass of crystal shards above you, which then continuously shoot downward a in a cone-shaped pattern around you for 2.5 seconds. You are unable to move for the entire duration of this. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 100
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Crystalian
vanilla_caption:
Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.

Creates a mass of crystal, then shatters it to scour a wide area with a violent rain of crystal shards.

This sorcery is used by high-ranking adepts among the Crystalians. Some also call this sorcery "the Crystal Sun."
vanilla_info: Scours area with violent rain of crystal shards

name: Crystal Torrent
caption:
Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.

The wrath of the Crystalians encapsulated in sorcery. Each shard is of substantial size, making even a stray blow capable of inflicting a severe wound.
info:
Shoot a barrage of crystal shards in a straight line. Hold to continue casting. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 57
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Crystalian
vanilla_caption:
Sorcery of the mysterious Crystalians.

Creates a mass of crystal, then fires off shards in rapid succession.
Hold to continue firing shards.

The wrath of the Crystalians encapsulated in sorcery. Each shard is of substantial size, making even a stray blow capable of inflicting a severe wound.
vanilla_info: Creates crystal mass that fires stream of crystal shards

One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

The Sellian sorcerers were assassins, and it is said that they often hunted their fellows.

Quickly conjure a magic projectile behind an enemy which then shoots towards them. Can be cast repeatedly and on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 146
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Night
vanilla_caption:
One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

Launches a projectile from a distance removed from the caster, so as to strike the enemy from behind.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly.

The Sellian sorcerers were assassins, and it is said that they often hunted their fellows.

One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

The Sellian sorcerers were assassins, and it is said that they often hunted their fellows.
info:
Quickly shoot a small magic projectile. Can be used without delay after performing another action, repeatedly and on horseback.

One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

info:
Shoot a magic projectile. Charging increases damage. Can be cast repeatedly, while in motion, and on horseback.

name: Thops's Barrier
caption:
The lifelong pursuit of Thops the Bluntstone.

Future generations will learn. They will know the foolishness of the sneering sorcerers who ridiculed this theory, little realizing that it was in fact a discovery worthy of a new conspectus of the academy.
info:
Conjure a very brief magic forcefield to deflect sorceries and incantations. Hold to cast repeatedly. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Glintstone
vanilla_caption:
The lifelong pursuit of Thops the Bluntstone.

Creates a magic forcefield that deflects sorceries and incantations.

name: Carian Retaliation
caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

This was the Carian royal family's secret means to prepare against the disloyalty of the academy. The moon and stars would one day go their separate ways.
info:
Conjure a very brief void to absorb a single enemy sorcery or incantation projectile and turn it into 3 magical dagger projectiles which float above you and automatically shoot into an enemy when they are within range. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 115
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Carian, Glintblade
vanilla_caption:
One of the sorceries of the Carian royal family.

Swing your staff to dispel incoming sorceries and incantations, using their power to retaliate with glintblades.

This was the Carian royal family's secret means to prepare against the disloyalty of the academy. The moon and stars would one day go their separate ways.
vanilla_info: Dispels enemy spells and retaliates with glintblades

name: Eternal Darkness
caption:
Forbidden sorcery of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

Originally a lost sorcery of the Eternal City; the despair that brought about its ruin made manifest.
info:
Conjure a very large void above you which pulls in most enemy sorceries and incantations for 9 seconds. Only 1 void per caster can exist at a time. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Night
vanilla_caption:
Forbidden sorcery of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

Creates a space of darkness that draws in sorceries and incantations.

Originally a lost sorcery of the Eternal City; the despair that brought about its ruin made manifest.

One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

Used by Sellian assassins to present themselves as unarmed sorcerers.

Enchant right-hand armament. Makes armament completely invisible for 45 seconds. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Night
vanilla_caption:
One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

Used by Sellian assassins to present themselves as unarmed sorcerers.

One of the night sorceries of Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

The Sellian assassins considered every option that aided their dirty work.

Become semi-invisible for 30 seconds, reducing the range at which non-aggressive enemies will notice you by 60%. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.

This sorcery originates from the Onyx Lords, who had skin of stone, and were called lords in reverential fear of their destructive power.

Conjure a very large void above you which shoots out rocks at different angles. Hold to continue casting.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 100

One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.

A manifestation of the power with which Astel leveled the Eternal City.

Conjure 3 very large voids above you which shoot out large rocks at different angles. Hold to continue casting.

One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.

A gravitational technique studied by the young Radahn. His master was an Alabaster Lord with skin of stone.
info:
Conjure 3 large rocks and throws them forward simultaneously. Can be cast on horseback.

One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.

A gravitational technique studied by the young Radahn. His master was an Alabaster Lord with skin of stone.

One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.

A gravitational technique studied by the young Radahn. His master was an Alabaster Lord with skin of stone.

Shoot a gravitational magic orb. Smaller enemies hit by the projectile will be pulled towards you slightly. Charging increases damage.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 180

One of the glintstone sorceries that manipulates gravitational forces.

A gravitational technique mastered by the young Radahn. "I thank you for your tutelage, for now I can challenge the stars."

name: Magma Shot
caption:
One of the sorceries developed from the magma of Mt. Gelmir.

After discovering the ancient hexes of Gelmir, Rykard, son of Queen Rennala, brought them back into practical use as new forms of sorcery.
info:
Lob a fireball which explodes on impact, leaving behind a small pool of magma for 3 seconds. Charging increases damage. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (projectile):</font> 210
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (magma):</font> 48
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged, projectile):</font> 250

One of the sorceries developed from the magma of Mt. Gelmir.

Fires a lump of magma that explodes on contact.

name: Gelmir's Fury
caption:
One of the sorceries developed from the magma of Mt. Gelmir.

This sorcery is held to represent the fury of the volcano, but the arrogance of attempting to harness it is solely that of men and serpents.
info:
Slam armament into the ground then sporadically lob fireballs in every direction around you, which leave very brief pools of magma on the ground where they land. Hold to continue casting the spell for up to 4 seconds.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (slam):</font> 160
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (fireball):</font> 125
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (magma):</font> 125
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Magma
vanilla_caption:
One of the sorceries developed from the magma of Mt. Gelmir.

name: Law of Regression
caption:
Incantation of the Golden Order fundamentalists. One of the key fundamentals.

The fundamentalists describe the Golden Order through the powers of regression and causality. Regression is the pull of meaning; that all things yearn eternally to converge.
info:
Cure <font color="#40BF40">poison</font>, <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot</font>, <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite</font>, and <font color="#C18B8B">acid debuff</font>. Alleviate all <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font>, <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot accumulation</font>, <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font>, <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font>, <font color="#A698F4">sleep accumulation</font>, <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font>, and <font color="#A17945">death blight accumulation</font>. Remove all active special effects, such as buffs or debuffs from spells, from everyone nearby, including your own. Reveal mimicry of any form. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order
vanilla_caption:
Incantation of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
One of the key fundamentals.

Heals all negative statuses, dispels special effects, and reveals mimicry in all its forms.

The fundamentalists describe the Golden Order through the powers of regression and causality. Regression is the pull of meaning; that all things yearn eternally to converge.
vanilla_info: Heals all ailments and dispels all special effects

Makes you completely immune to <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font>, <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>, <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font>, <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font>, <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font>, <font color="#EF7676">scarlet rot accumulation</font>, <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font>, <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font>, <font color="#A698F4">sleep accumulation</font>, <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font>, and <font color="#A17945">death blight accumulation</font> from blocked attacks for 30 seconds.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order
vanilla_caption:

Enchants shield held in the left hand with the light of regression, increasing all forms of non-physical damage negation and ailment resistance.

Two concepts form the basis for Golden Order fundamentalism. One is the law of regression, to which this incantation relates.

name: Litany of Proper Death
caption:
One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists. Used by hunters of Those Who Live in Death.

The role of the hunters is to stamp out defiled reasonall for the perfection of the Golden Order.
info:
Shoot an arc of light along the ground in front of you. Inflicts 900% more damage to Those Who Live in Death.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order
vanilla_caption:
One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
Used by hunters of Those Who Live in Death.

The role of the hunters is to stamp out defiled reasonall for the perfection of the Golden Order.
vanilla_info: Creates image of Order to deal holy damage

name: Law of Causality
caption:
One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists. One of the key fundamentals.

The fundamentalists describe the Golden Order through the powers of regression and causality. Causality is the pull between meanings; that which links all things in a chain of relation.
info:
Conjure a small ring of light on you which will explode after receiving 5 attacks. This does not include damage from status effects, damage over time effects, self-inflicted damage, or attacks where 100% of the damage was blocked using a shield. The resulting explosion doesn't harm yourself. The ring will disappear after 120 seconds if the explosion is not triggered. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 487
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Golden Order
vanilla_caption:
One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
One of the key fundamentals.

Manifests a small ring of causality within that allows the caster to automatically retaliate upon receiving a certain number of blows.

The fundamentalists describe the Golden Order through the powers of regression and causality. Causality is the pull between meanings; that which links all things in a chain of relation.
vanilla_info: Retaliates upon receiving a number of blows

info:

name: Order Healing
caption:
One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists. Used by hunters of Those Who Live in Death.

The noble Goldmask lamented what had become of the hunters. How easy it is for learning and learnedness to be reduced to the ravings of fanatics; all the good and the great wanted, in their foolishness, was an absolute evil to contend with. Does such a notion exist in the fundamentals of Order?
info:
Alleviate all <font color="#A17945">death blight accumulation</font>. Can be cast on horseback.

caption:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
Channels the power of Smarag, the Glintstone Dragon.

Smarag was a devourer of sorcerers, and over time, his body became corrupted by their glintstones.
info:
Jump up and conjure a dragon head that breathes magical flames, which inflicts <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> 2 times per second. Hold to extend duration. Can be cast while in the air.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 188
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion
vanilla_caption:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
Channels the power of Smarag, the Glintstone Dragon.

Transforms caster into a dragon to spew magic breath from above.
Charging extends duration. This incantation can be cast while jumping.

Smarag was a devourer of sorcerers, and over time, his body became corrupted by their glintstones.
vanilla_info: Spews magic breath of Glintstone Dragon Smarag from above

name: Placidusax's Ruin
caption:
Power gleaned from the remembrance of Dragonlord Placidusax.

These are the dying wails of the Dragonlord who once dwelled eternally beyond time.
info:
Cause an explosion of red lightning around you then jump up and conjure a dragon head which shoots a golden beam in a wide arc in front of you. Can be cast while in the air.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (beam):</font> 356
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (explosion):</font> 241
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> None
vanilla_caption:
Power gleaned from the remembrance of Dragonlord Placidusax.

Transforms caster into the Dragonlord to spew golden breath from above.
This incantation can be cast while jumping.

These are the dying wails of the Dragonlord who once dwelled eternally beyond time.
vanilla_info: Spews golden breath of Dragonlord Placidusax

name: Dragonclaw
caption:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.

Incantation of those who have hunted dragons and feasted upon their hearts. Theirs is a pure and overwhelming power.
info:
Conjure a dragon claw and slam in to the ground to cause a shockwave. Allows one follow-up cast, which is slightly stronger.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (claw):</font> 395, 410
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (shockwave):</font> 253, 263
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion
vanilla_caption:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.

Transforms caster into a dragon to tear through foes with dragon claws.
Allows one follow-up attack.

Incantation of those who have hunted dragons and feasted upon their hearts. Theirs is a pure and overwhelming power.
vanilla_info: Channels dragon to rend foes with dragon claws

name: Dragonmaw
caption:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.

Incantation of those who have hunted dragons and feasted upon their hearts. Theirs is a pure and overwhelming power.
info:
Conjure a dragon head which will bite in front of you.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 628
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion
vanilla_caption:
One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.

Transforms caster into a dragon to bite enemies before them.

Incantation of those who have hunted dragons and feasted upon their hearts. Theirs is a pure and overwhelming power.
vanilla_info: Channels dragon to bite foes before caster

name: Greyoll's Roar
caption:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of Greyoll, the Elder Dragon. An incantation of legendary status.

Greyoll was the mother of all dragons, dwarfing all who stood before her like a looming mountain.
info:
Conjure a dragon head which lets out a loud roar. Reduces <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 15% and <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 10% for all nearby enemies for 60 seconds.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Dragon Communion
vanilla_caption:
Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
Channels the power of Greyoll, the Elder Dragon.
An incantation of legendary status.

Transforms caster into a dragon to emit a terrible roar, reducing the attack power and defense of nearby enemies.

Greyoll was the mother of all dragons, dwarfing all who stood before her like a looming mountain.
vanilla_info: Emits the roar of Elder Dragon Greyoll

name: Pest Threads
caption:
Incantation of the servants of rot.

A technique of the pale pests who crawl through the lands afflicted by scarlet rot; the abandoned children of the goddess.
"Do you have an interest in rot incantations?"
info:
Shoot a large number of projectiles in an arc above you, which then fly toward the target.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 60
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot
vanilla_caption:
Incantation of the servants of rot.

Secretes countless sticky threads, launching them forwards.

A technique of the pale pests who crawl through the lands afflicted by scarlet rot; the abandoned children of the goddess.
"Do you have an interest in rot incantations?"
vanilla_info: Launches countless sticky threads before caster

name: Swarm of Flies
caption:
A Blood Oath incantation, shared from the Lord of Blood's power.

The new palace of the Lord of Blood lies in a swamp of festering blood, and these flies are said to spawn from excrement in that land.
info:
Conjure a swarm of bloodflies which attack the target 6 times with alternating damage. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 52, 15, 52, 15, 52, 15
<font color="#C84343">Base blood loss accumulation:</font> 0, 70, 0, 70, 0, 70
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Blood Oath
vanilla_caption:
A Blood Oath incantation, shared from the Lord of Blood's power.

Releases a swarm of bloodflies before the caster to assault foes. The vile swarm deals damage and builds up onset of blood loss.
This incantation can be cast while in motion.

The new palace of the Lord of Blood lies in a swamp of festering blood, and these flies are said to spawn from excrement in that land.
vanilla_info: Releases a swarm of bloodflies before caster

name: Poison Mist
caption:
Incantation of the servants of rot.

Those who dwell within poison know rot all too well. The death that begets life, that comes to all equally. That is to say: it is the cycle of rebirth put into practice.
info:
Conjure a cloud of poison mist which lasts for 15 seconds and causes <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font> 5 times per second. Can be cast while in motion and on horseback.

<font color="#40BF40">Poison:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.07% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 7, every second for 90 seconds.

<font color="#40BF40">Base poison accumulation:</font> 20
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot
vanilla_caption:
Incantation of the servants of rot.

Releases a poisonous mist before the caster.
This incantation can be cast while in motion.

Those who dwell within poison know rot all too well. The death that begets life, that comes to all equally. That is to say: it is the cycle of rebirth put into practice.
vanilla_info: Releases poison mist before caster

name: Poison Armament
caption:
Incantation of the servants of rot.

Those who dwell within poison know rot all too well. The death that begets life, that comes to all equally. That is to say: it is the cycle of rebirth put into practice.
info:
Enchant right-hand armament. Causes 70 <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font> per attack for 60 seconds. Can be cast while in motion.

<font color="#40BF40">Poison:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.07% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 7, every second for 90 seconds.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot
vanilla_caption:
Incantation of the servants of rot.

Enchants armament held in the right hand with poison.
This incantation can be cast while in motion.

Those who dwell within poison know rot all too well. The death that begets life, that comes to all equally. That is to say: it is the cycle of rebirth put into practice.
vanilla_info: Enchants right-hand armament with poison

name: Scarlet Aeonia
caption:
Technique of Malenia, the Goddess of Rot.

Each time the scarlet flower blooms, Malenia's rot advances. It has bloomed twice already. With the third bloom, she will become a true goddess.
info:
Incarnate a giant flower that blooms into an explosion of scarlet rot mist which lingers for 4 seconds.

<font color="#EF7676">Scarlet rot:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.33% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 13, every second for 90 seconds.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (explosion):</font> 362
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (mist):</font> 60
<font color="#EF7676">Base scarlet rot accumulation (explosion):</font> 150
<font color="#EF7676">Base scarlet rot accumulation (mist):</font> 50
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Servants of Rot
vanilla_caption:
Technique of Malenia, the Goddess of Rot.

Creates a gigantic flower that blooms into an explosion of scarlet rot.

Each time the scarlet flower blooms, Malenia's rot advances. It has bloomed twice already. With the third bloom, she will become a true goddess.
vanilla_info: Creates giant flower that explodes with scarlet rot

name: Inescapable Frenzy
caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

To gaze into one another's eyes is truly the most intimate form of human contact.
info:
Grab a Tarnished and emit a yellow flame of frenzy directly into their eyes 6 times. Causes <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself for the initial cast and each of the 6 hits. This is only effective against Tarnished and cannot be used on any other enemies.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 70
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 50
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame
vanilla_caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

Causes the yellow flame of frenzy to blaze from the caster's eyes. The caster then latches onto foes, spreading the madness.
This incantation also causes buildup of madness in the caster, and is only effective against Tarnished.

To gaze into one another's eyes is truly the most intimate form of human contact.
vanilla_info: Latches onto foes to spread madness

name: The Flame of Frenzy
caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

The flame of frenzy deals damage and causes accumulation of madness. This incantation also causes accumulation of madness in the caster, and is only effective against Tarnished.
info:
Sporadically shoot several yellow flame of frenzy streams. Charging increases damage and distance. Causes <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 107
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 124
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 25
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation (charged):</font> 35
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame
vanilla_caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

Causes the yellow flame of frenzy to burst forth from the caster's eyes.
Charging increases the range of the burst.

The flame of frenzy deals damage and causes buildup of madness. This incantation also causes buildup of madness in the caster, and is only effective against Tarnished.
vanilla_info: Emits burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes

name: Unendurable Frenzy
caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

It is the maddening pain and unstoppable tears of those afflicted with the flame of frenzy brought into being.
info:
Sporadically shoot several yellow flame of frenzy streams forward, then several more in every direction. Hold to continue casting. Causes <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 125
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 25
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame
vanilla_caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

Causes the yellow flame of frenzy to violently burst forth from the caster's eyes.
Hold to continue channeling the flame. This incantation can be used while in motion.

It is the maddening pain and unstoppable tears of those afflicted with the flame of frenzy brought into being.
vanilla_info: Emits violent burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes

name: Frenzied Burst
caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

In times past, every single person who attempted to control the flame of frenzy succumbed to madness after a desperate internal struggle. This incantation is testament to a meager victory.
info:
Shoot a blast of yellow flame of frenzy. Charging increases damage and allows projectile to penetrate enemy's guard. Causes 20 <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself, 30 if charged. Can be cast on horseback.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 250
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged):</font> 309
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 90
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation (charged):</font> 105
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame
vanilla_caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

Releases concentrated blasts of the yellow flame of frenzy from the caster's eyes.
Charging enhances potency, enabling the blasts to penetrate the enemy's guard.

In times past, every single person who attempted to control the flame of frenzy succumbed to madness after a desperate internal struggle. This incantation is testament to a meager victory.
vanilla_info: Emits concentrated blast of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes

name: Howl of Shabriri
caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

It is said that the sickness of the flame of frenzy began with Shabriri, the most reviled man in all history.
info:
Release a maddening shriek which produces a yellow flame of frenzy wave around you, hitting enemies several times. Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 25% but reduces <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 30% for yourself for 40 seconds. Causes <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 22
<font color="#EEAA2B">Base madness accumulation:</font> 60
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Frenzied Flame
vanilla_caption:
Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.

Releases a maddening shriek that causes madness buildup in foes nearby.
This incantation also causes madness buildup in the caster and makes enemies more likely to target them.

It is said that the sickness of the flame of frenzy began with Shabriri, the most reviled man in all history.
vanilla_info: Shrieks, building up madness in nearby foes

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Tail
caption:
One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.

This is a manifestation of the Erdtree's primal vital energiesan aspect of the primordial crucible, where all life was once blended together.
info:
Conjure a large tail a swing it in a horizontal arc in front of you. Hold to do a second, stronger swing.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 202, 274
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree, Aspects of the Crucible
vanilla_caption:
One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.

Creates a supple tail that sweeps through foes before the caster.
Charging enhances potency.

This is a manifestation of the Erdtree's primal vital energiesan aspect of the primordial crucible, where all life was once blended together.
vanilla_info: Creates supple tail to sweep area before caster

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Horns
caption:
One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.

This is a manifestation of the Erdtree's primal vital energiesan aspect of the primordial crucible, where all life was once blended together.
info:
Conjure a horn on your shoulder and ram it forward. Charging increases damage and cuases you to charge forward.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 277
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (charged):</font> 327
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree, Aspects of the Crucible
vanilla_caption:
One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.

Creates a mighty horn on the caster's shoulder to gore foes from a low stance.
Charging allows the caster to barrel into foes before delivering the final attack.

This is a manifestation of the Erdtree's primal vital energiesan aspect of the primordial crucible, where all life was once blended together.
vanilla_info: Creates shoulder horn to gore foes from low stance

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Breath
caption:
One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.

This is a manifestation of the Erdtree's primal vital energiesan aspect of the primordial crucible, where all life was once blended together.
info:
Walk forward while spewing a wide arc of flames. Hold to continue casting for a few more steps.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 98
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree, Aspects of the Crucible
vanilla_caption:
One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.

Creates a throat pouch on the caster's neck, allowing them to spew fiery breath while walking.
Charging increases duration of the breath.

This is a manifestation of the Erdtree's primal vital energiesan aspect of the primordial crucible, where all life was once blended together.
vanilla_info: Creates throat pouch to spew fire while walking

name: Black Blade
caption:
Power gleaned from the remembrance of Maliketh.

This blade was once imbued with Destined Death.
info:
Conjure an illusory greatsword and swing it vertically in front of you, which shoots out a projectile. Allows one follow-up cast, which is a slightly stronger horizontal swing. In addition to the damage from the attack, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds and have their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> reduced by 10% for 15 seconds.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (greatsword):</font> 225, 232
<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (projectile):</font> 162, 169
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree
vanilla_caption:
Power gleaned from the remembrance of Maliketh.

Caster creates an illusory black blade, then leaps forward to deliver a spinning slash that emits a wave of light.
This can be followed up with one additional attack.

This blade was once imbued with Destined Death. In addition to dealing damage, it reduces foes' maximum HP and continues to sap their current HP for a very short time.
vanilla_info: Black blade spinning slash that emits wave of light

name: Fire's Deadly Sin
caption:
Incantation originating from a deeply ominous prophecy.

The prophet despaired, looking up at the Erdtree, for soon the kindling would burst into flame, bringing ruin.

"The burning of the Erdtree is the first cardinal sin. That is not the domain of mere men."
info:
Create an explosion of flame around you, igniting yourself on fire for 40 seconds. You will take 3 damage per second during this time. Charging increases damage but also increase damage per second you take to 4.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosion):</font> 183
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (fire):</font> 45
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged, explosion):</font> 212
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (charged, fire):</font> 59
<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Fire Monk
vanilla_caption:
Incantation originating from a deeply ominous prophecy.

Sets both the caster and the surrounding area ablaze with raging flames. The caster's body will remain engulfed in flame for a while, burning them and any who draw near. Charging enhances potency.

The prophet despaired, looking up at the Erdtree, for soon the kindling would burst into flame, bringing ruin.

"The burning of the Erdtree is the first cardinal sin. That is not the domain of mere men."
vanilla_info: Sets area and self ablaze with raging flames

name: Golden Lightning Fortification
caption:
An incantation of Erdtree Worship.

This incantation was used by the knights of the Erdtree during the assault by the great ancient dragon Gransax, and the bitter War of the Ancient Dragons that followed.
info:
Increase <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage negation</font> by 60% for yourself and nearby allies for 70 seconds. Hold to delay activation.

<font color="#E0B985">Category:</font> Erdtree
vanilla_caption:
An incantation of Erdtree Worship.

Greatly increases lightning damage negation for the caster and nearby allies.
Hold to continue praying, delaying the effect.

This incantation was used by the knights of the Erdtree during the assault by the great ancient dragon Gransax, and the bitter War of the Ancient Dragons that followed.
vanilla_info: Greatly increases lightning resistance for self and allies

name: Stonesword Key
caption:
A sword-shaped stone key.

Think well before using one.
info:
Breaks the seal on imp statues. Remains embedded in the statue after use, meaning it can only be used once.

Some imp statues require 2 keys to break the seal.
vanilla_caption:
A sword-shaped stone key.

Breaks the seal on imp statues, but remains embedded in the statue after use, meaning it can only be used once as an item.

Think well before using one.
vanilla_info: Use to break one imp statue seal

name: Academy Glintstone Key
caption:
Key to the seals binding both gates to the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

A glintstone key will remember its user, meaning once used it can never be passed on to another. The academy does not welcome the indolent.
info: Allows access to the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
vanilla_caption:
Key to the seals binding both gates to the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Activates warp magic bound within the seals.

A glintstone key will remember its user, meaning once used it can never be passed on to another. The academy does not welcome the indolent.
vanilla_info: Key to open the academy's two sealed gates

name: Carian Inverted Statue
caption:
Statuette of a scholar, with ground and sky inverted.

To unveil the secret, affix it to the pedestal of the celestial globe.
info: Reveals the hidden form of the Carian Study Hall.
vanilla_caption:
Statuette of a scholar, with ground and sky inverted.

Reveals the hidden form of the Carian Study Hall, which connects to the divine tower.

To unveil the secret, affix it to the pedestal of the celestial globe.
vanilla_info: Key revealing the hidden form of Carian Study Hall

name: Irina's Letter
caption:
Letter given by Irina, addressed to her father, the commander of Castle Morne.

Gorgeous silken handkerchief, lightly stained with blood. Words can be made out within.
info: Irina requested this be given to her father, the commander of Castle Morne.
vanilla_caption:
Letter given by Irina, addressed to her father, the commander of Castle Morne.

Gorgeous silken handkerchief, lightly stained with blood. Words can be made out within.
vanilla_info: Letter addressed to the commander of Castle Morne

name: Drawing-Room Key
info: Allows access some of the rooms in Volcano Manor, including the drawing room.
vanilla_caption:
Key to Volcano Manor's drawing room.

The door can be found in the westward corridor, upon the left hand side.
vanilla_info: Key to the Volcano Manor drawing room

name: Amber Starlight
caption:
An ephemeral sliver that gives off a pale amber glow. What remains of a passing flash of starlight.

If the stars command our fates, then amber-hued stars must command the fates of the gods. Such is the belief that inspired the use of these shards to prepare a most special draught.

Cannot be consumed by mere humans.
info: Ingredient used in a special draught.
vanilla_caption:
An ephemeral sliver that gives off a pale amber glow.
What remains of a passing flash of starlight.

If the stars command our fates, then amber-hued stars must command the fates of the gods. Such is the belief that inspired the use of these shards to prepare a most special draught.

Cannot be consumed by mere humans.
vanilla_info: Ingredient used in special draught

name: Spirit Calling Bell
info:
Possessing this allows you to summon spirits from ashen remains.

Spirits can only be summoned in the vicinity of a rebirth monument. When summoning is possible, the monument icon will be visible on the left side of the screen.

Only one type of spirit may be summoned at once.
vanilla_caption:
A bell capable of summoning various spirits
from ashen remains. It usually requires FP to use.

Spirits can only be summoned in the vicinity of a rebirth monument. When summoning is possible, the monument icon will be visible on the left side of the screen.

Only one type of spirit may be summoned at once, and none may be summoned during multiplayer.
vanilla_info: Bell that summons various spirits from ashen items

name: Fingerslayer Blade
caption:
The hidden treasure of the Eternal City of Nokron and symbolizes its downfall; a blood-drenched blade said to have been born of a corpse.

Cannot be wielded by those without a fate, but is said to be able to harm the Greater Will and its vassals.
info: Proof of the high treason committed by the Eternal City.
vanilla_caption:
The hidden treasure of the Eternal City of Nokron; a blade said to have been born of a corpse.

This blood-drenched fetish is proof of the high treason committed by the Eternal City and symbolizes its downfall.

Cannot be wielded by those without a fate, but is said to be able to harm the Greater Will and its vassals.
vanilla_info: Hidden treasure of the Eternal City of Nokron

name: Sewing Needle
caption: A large sewing needle, curved like a fang.
info: Enables garb alterations from Boc.
vanilla_caption:
A large sewing needle, curved like a fang.
Boc the demi-human's prized possession.
vanilla_info: Boc the demi-human's prized sewing needle

name: Gold Sewing Needle
caption:
Sewing needle made of gold.

One of the tools brought by Radagon when he entered into marriage with Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon, and joined the Carian line.
info: Allows demigod garb alterations from Boc.
vanilla_caption:
Sewing needle made of gold.
Unique item made to alter demigod attire.

One of the tools brought by Radagon when he entered into marriage with Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon, and joined the Carian line.
vanilla_info: Special sewing needle for demigod attire

name: Tailoring Tools
caption: A portable set of tailoring tools.
info: Enables garb alterations at sites of grace.
vanilla_caption:
A portable set of tailoring tools.

Enables armor alterations at sites of grace.
vanilla_info: Enables armor adjustment at sites of grace

name: Seluvis's Potion
caption: Small flask received from Preceptor Seluvis containing a cloudy tonic of bluish black.
info: "Find Nepheli, and ensure she drinks it." - Seluvis
vanilla_caption:
Small flask received from Preceptor Seluvis containing a cloudy tonic of bluish black.

"Find Nepheli, and ensure she drinks it."
vanilla_info: Small flask received from Preceptor Seluvis

name: Amber Draught
caption: Small flask received from Preceptor Seluvis containing a gleaming amber draught for use in a scheme.
info: "Give it to Ranni and ensure she drinks it. And we'll be in a position to claim the very finest puppet ever crafted." - Seluvis
vanilla_caption:
Small flask received from Preceptor Seluvis containing a gleaming amber draught for use in a scheme.

"Give it to Ranni and ensure she drinks it. And we'll be in a position to claim the very finest puppet ever crafted."
vanilla_info: Glistening amber draught made for a scheme

He can be found at the Ruin-Strewn Precipice. Find the red mark on your map for the exact location.

name: Academy Glintstone Key
caption:
Key to the seals binding both gates to the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

A glintstone key will remember its user, meaning once used it can never be passed on to another. The academy does not welcome the indolent. This glintstone key is still brand new, unused by anyone.
info: Allows access to the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
vanilla_caption:
Key to the seals binding both gates to the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

Activates warp magic bound within the seals.

This glintstone key is still brand new, unused by anyone.
vanilla_info: Key to open the academy's two sealed gates

name: Golden Tailoring Tools
caption: Tailoring tools made from gold. Tools brought with the red-haired Radagon when he married into the Carian line.
info: Allows demigod garb alterations at sites of grace.
vanilla_caption:
Tailoring tools made from gold.
Tools brought with the red-haired Radagon when he married into the Carian line.

With these, even demigod attire can be altered at a site of grace.
vanilla_info: Allows demigod garb alteration at sites of grace

caption: A simple map given by Fia.
info:
Shows the location of a black knifeprint.

name: Discarded Palace Key
caption: A key discarded by Lunar Princess Ranni alongside her very flesh.
info: Opens a treasure chest passed down to Carian Princesses, found in the Grand Library of Raya Lucaria.
vanilla_caption:
A key discarded by Lunar Princess Ranni alongside her very flesh.

Opens a treasure chest passed down to Carian Princesses.

It is said to be found in the Grand Library of Raya Lucaria with her mother Rennala.

name: Iron Whetblade
caption: Iron whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife.
info:
When applying an affinity using ashes of war, additional affinities can be chosen:

- <font color="#F395C4">Heavy</font>
- <font color="#F395C4">Keen</font>
- <font color="#F395C4">Quality</font>
vanilla_caption:
Iron whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife.

When applying an affinity using ashes of war, an additional affinity of heavy, keen, or quality can be chosen.
vanilla_info: Grants choice of affinity upgrade to weapon

name: Red-Hot Whetblade
caption: Red-hot whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife.
info:
When applying an affinity using physical or flame-type ashes of war, additional affinities can be chosen:

- <font color="#F48C25">Fire</font>
- <font color="#F48C25">Flame art</font>
vanilla_caption:
Red-hot whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife.

When applying an affinity using physical or flame-type ashes of war, an additional affinity of fire or flame art can be chosen.
vanilla_info: Grants choice of affinity upgrade to weapon

name: Sanctified Whetblade
caption: Sanctified whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife.
info:
When applying an affinity using physical or golden-type ashes of war, additional affinities can be chosen:

- <font color="#F5EB89">Sacred</font>
- <font color="#FFE033">Lightning</font>
vanilla_caption:
Sanctified whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife.

When applying an affinity using physical or golden-type ashes of war, an additional affinity of sacred or lightning can be chosen.
vanilla_info: Grants choice of affinity upgrade to weapon

name: Glintstone Whetblade
caption: Glintstone whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife.
info:
When applying an affinity using physical or magic-type ashes of war, additional affinities can be chosen:

- <font color="#57DBCE">Magic</font>
- <font color="#9DD7FB">Frost</font>

Glintstone whetblade with a cipher engraved. Can be used as a whetstone knife.

When applying an affinity using physical or magic-type ashes of war, an additional affinity of magic or frost can be chosen.

- <font color="#40BF40">Poison</font>
- <font color="#C84343">Blood</font>

name: Beast Eye
caption:
Claw-marked stone eye received from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman.

The murky violet iris writhes as if alive.
"I am not sated... Feed me more...Death..."
info: Trembles when near Deathroot.
vanilla_caption:
Claw-marked stone eye received from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman.

It is said to tremble when near Deathroot.

The murky violet iris writhes as if alive.
"I am not sated... Feed me more...Death..."
vanilla_info: Said to tremble when close to Deathroot

name: Weathered Dagger
caption:
Dagger received from Fia, the Deathbed Companion.

It was once a special weapon of gold and silver intertwined, but is now worn down and marred by a black gash.
info: Fia wishes for it to be returned to its rightful owner.
vanilla_caption:
Dagger received from Fia, the Deathbed Companion.

She wishes for it to be returned to its rightful owner.

It was once a special weapon of gold and silver intertwined, but is now worn down and marred by a black gash.
vanilla_info: Dagger received from Fia, Deathbed Companion

name: About Marika's Effigy at the Roundtable
caption:
The effigy of Marika at the Roundtable Hold can be used to enter Colosseum combat.

Your preferred ruleset may be chosen from those of Colosseums already visited.
info:
Information about the effigy of Marika at the Roundtable Hold.

<?keyicon@31?> Examine
vanilla_caption:
The effigy of Marika at the Roundtable Hold can be used to enter Colosseum combat.

Your preferred ruleset may be chosen from those of Colosseums already visited.
vanilla_info:
About the effigy of Marika at the Roundtable Hold.
Examine using <?keyicon@31?>

name: Ritual Pot
caption:
This empty pot somehow mends itself when broken. Special item with greater durability than a Cracked Pot.

The materials and magics sealed within deploy their effects when the pot is thrown.
info: Container required for crafting items.
vanilla_caption:
This empty pot somehow mends itself when broken.
Special item with greater durability than a cracked pot.

Essential vessel for crafting ritual pot items.

The materials and magics sealed within deploy their effects when the pot is thrown.
vanilla_info: Container required for crafting ritual pot items

name: Golden Seed
caption:
A golden seed, found at the base of an illusory tree.

When the Elden Ring was shattered, these seeds flew from the Erdtree, scattering across the various lands, as if life itself knew that its end had come.
info: Can be used at a site of grace to increase the Sacred Flask's number of uses.
vanilla_caption:
A golden seed, found at the base of an illusory tree.

Increases a Sacred Flask's number of uses.
(Can be used after resting at a site of grace.)

When the Elden Ring was shattered, these seeds flew from the Erdtree, scattering across the various lands, as if life itself knew that its end had come.
vanilla_info: Increases Sacred Flask's number of uses

name: Sacred Tear
caption:
Blessing of the Erdtree, worshiped in the churches of all lands; this is but a faint vestige.

During the age of the Erdtree, these tears were used to spread the faith, for theirs was once a certain blessing.
info: Can be used at a site of grace to increase the Sacred Flask's restorative effects.
vanilla_caption:
Blessing of the Erdtree, worshiped in the churches of all lands; this is but a faint vestige.

Increases the potency of a Sacred Flask's restorative effects.
(Can be used after resting at a site of grace.)

During the age of the Erdtree, these tears were used to spread the faith, for theirs was once a certain blessing.
vanilla_info: Improves Sacred Flask's potency

name: Memory Stone
caption:
A black, lightly beguiling stone. Prized by the sorcerers who produce them.

Said to be a fragment of the black moon that once hung above the Eternal City.
info: Possessing this increases the number of available <font color="#E0B985">memory slots</font> by 1, allowing more spells to be memorized.
vanilla_caption:
A black, lightly beguiling stone.
Prized by the sorcerers who produce them.

Increases memory slots.

Said to be a fragment of the black moon that once hung above the Eternal City.
vanilla_info: Increases memory slots

name: Talisman Pouch
caption:
Small, withered bag, knitted by hand. Bestowed upon the ruling lord, or those attempting to become lord, by the elderly Finger Reader.

As the voices of the Two Fingers, Finger Readers are said to live lives eternal, and one is even supposed to have served as a wetnurse to royalty.
info: Possessing this increases the number of available <font color="#E0B985">talisman slots</font> by 1, allowing another talisman to be equipped.
vanilla_caption:
Small, withered bag, knitted by hand. Bestowed upon the ruling lord, or those attempting to become lord, by the elderly Finger Reader.

Increases talisman equip slots.

As the voices of the Two Fingers, Finger Readers are said to live lives eternal, and one is even supposed to have served as a wetnurse to royalty.
vanilla_info: Increases talisman equip slots

name: Crimsonspill Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> by 10% for 180 seconds.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
The resulting concoction temporarily raises one's maximum HP.
vanilla_info: Temporarily boosts max HP in mixed physick

name: Greenspill Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum stamina</font> by 15% for 180 seconds.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
The resulting concoction temporarily raises one's maximum stamina.
vanilla_info: Temporarily boosts stamina in mixed physick

name: Crimson Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Restores 50% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font>.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
The resulting concoction restores half of one's maximum HP.
vanilla_info: Restores half of total HP in mixed physick

name: Crimson Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Restores 50% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font>.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
The resulting concoction restores half of one's maximum HP.
vanilla_info: Restores half of total HP in mixed physick

name: Cerulean Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Restores 50% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font>.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
The resulting concoction restores half of one's maximum FP.
vanilla_info: Restores half of total FP in mixed physick

name: Cerulean Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Restores 50% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font>.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
The resulting concoction restores half of one's maximum FP.
vanilla_info: Restores half of total FP in mixed physick

name: Speckled Hardtear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Cures <font color="#E0B985">all status ailments</font>, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all resistances</font> by 90 for 180 seconds.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
The resulting concoction temporarily raises all resistances and heals all status ailments.
vanilla_info: Boosts resistance and heals status in mixed physick

name: Crimson Bubbletear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Restores 30% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> if HP falls below 20% within 180 seconds. This effect can only be triggered once.

This will not prevent death if HP reaches 0% before the healing effect is triggered.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
The resulting concoction automatically heals one's HP in the moment before death.

However, this effect only occurs once, and will expire after a certain duration.
vanilla_info: Restores HP when near death in mixed physick

name: Opaline Bubbletear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Reduces <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 90% for the next single attack received within 180 seconds.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
Provides significant damage negation.

However, this effect only occurs once, and will expire after a certain duration.
vanilla_info: Significantly negates damage in mixed physick

name: Crimsonburst Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Restores 7 HP per second for 180 seconds.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
The resulting concoction gradually restores one's HP over time.
vanilla_info: Steadily restores HP for a time in mixed physick

name: Greenburst Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">stamina regeneration</font> by 15 per second for 180 seconds.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
The resulting concoction temporarily boosts stamina recovery speed.
vanilla_info: Temporarily boosts stamina recovery speed in mixed physick

name: Opaline Hardtear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 15% for 180 seconds.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
The resulting concoction temporarily boosts all forms of damage negation.
vanilla_info: Temporarily boosts all damage negation in physick

name: Winged Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum equip load</font> by 350% for 180 seconds.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
Temporarily reduces equipment load.
vanilla_info: Temporarily reduces equip load in mixed physick

name: Thorny Cracked Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> after multiple attacks within a short time. There are 3 tiers of damage increase: 9%, 13%, and 20%. The tear's effect lasts for 180 seconds, although the damage bonus resets if no attacks are performed within a short amount of time.

The number of attacks required to trigger this effect varies per weapon, and is not based on damage or weapon speed. It generally requires 3-4 attacks to trigger the first tier, 5-8 attacks for the second, and 8-11 attacks for the third. Some weapons are too slow to trigger all tiers.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
The resulting concoction makes consecutive attacks grow stronger the longer they continue. However, the effect lasts only for a short time.
vanilla_info: Makes consecutive attacks grow stronger in mixed physick

name: Spiked Cracked Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> of charged melee attacks by 15% for 180 seconds.

This effect does not work for charged sorceries, incantations, or weapon skills.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
The resulting concoction increases the power of charged attacks for a certain duration.
vanilla_info: Enhances charged attacks for a time in mixed physick

name: Windy Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases invulnerability duration for dodge rolls but increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 15% for 180 seconds.

This effect doesn't stack with the Crucible Feather Talisman.
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
The resulting concoction increases the effectiveness of dodge rolls for a certain duration. However, damage taken is also increased during the concoction's effect.
vanilla_info: Enhances dodge rolls for a time in mixed physick

name: Ruptured Crystal Tear
caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

A defective crystal tear which possesses absolutely no medicinal qualities. A lesson said to be learned the hard way for some; faith can be a volatile matter, after all.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Creates an explosion of <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> 3 seconds after consuming, but inflicts 300 damage on yourself. Having 2 Ruptured Crystal Tears in the Flask of Wondrous Physick increases the damage and doubles the size of the explosion, but also increases the damage to yourself to 700.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (1 tear):</font> 800
<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (2 tears):</font> 1750
vanilla_caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

Can be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick.
Causes the resulting concoction to explode.

A defective crystal tear which possesses absolutely no medicinal qualities. A lesson said to be learned the hard way for some; faith can be a volatile matter, after all.
vanilla_info: Causes concoction to explode in mixed physick
